Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleController
    ArticleController class, as in the Script / Uni Book It's surely a bit modifed, because it uses the DB
    ImageController
    ImageController manages the DB Stuff for Images
    LoginController
    LoginController manages everything with the currentUser and Loggedin stuff
    You could place here also a registration System (but better put it in a own File)
    manageImagesController
    Controller for the manageImages View
    manageOrdersController
    Controller for the manageOrders View
    manageUsersController
    Controller for View manageUsers
    OrderController  
    Shop
    Shop Main Contains everything Shop related, it's everywhere accessable by getInstance()
    ShoppingCart
    This is a ShoppingCart :)
    ShoppingCartItem
    Defines the ShoppingCartItem used in ShoppingCart Needs to be Serializable (otherweise GJSon can't convert them)
    UserController
    UserController manages Users
